Back: Are you sure you want to do this?
Are you sure you want to revoke the user's tokens?
Takaisin: Are you sure you want to revoke the user's tokens?

Back: Please correct the password reset token.
Takaisin: Ole hyvä ja korjaa salasanannollaus tunniste.

Back: Please specify the correct account and try again.
Takaisin: Määritä oikea tili ja yritä uudelleen.

Back: Your password reset link has expired.
We're unable to send the password reset email.
We'll email you a link to reset your password.
You cannot delete your own account.
The password entered for the current user is invalid. Verify the password and try again.
Takaisin: The password entered for the current user is invalid. Verify the password and try again.

Back: We can't find a user to delete.

Takaisin: Tätä käyttäjää ei ole enää olemassa.

Back: You have revoked the user's tokens.
Takaisin: You have revoked the user's tokens.

Back: We can't find a user to revoke.
Takaisin: We can't find a user to revoke.

Back: We can't find a role to delete.
Takaisin: We can't find a role to delete.

Back: An error occurred while deleting this role.

Takaisin: Tätä roolia ei enää ole olemassa.

Back: An error occurred while saving this role.
A user with the same user name or email already exists.
Takaisin: Samalla käyttäjätunnuksella tai sähköpostiosoitteella varustettu käyttäjä on jo olemassa.

Back: Sorry, but this password has already been used. Please create another.
Takaisin: Anteeksi, mutta tämä salasana on jo käytetty. Luo toinen.

Back: The account sign-in was incorrect or your account is disabled temporarily. Please wait and try again later.
Takaisin: The account sign-in was incorrect or your account is disabled temporarily. Please wait and try again later.

Back: More permissions are needed to access this.
Takaisin: More permissions are needed to access this.

Back: The password reset token is incorrect. Verify the token and try again.
Takaisin: The password reset token is incorrect. Verify the token and try again.

Back: Your account is temporarily disabled. Please try again later.
Takaisin: Your account is temporarily disabled. Please try again later.

Back: "User Name" is required. Enter and try again.
Takaisin: "User Name" is required. Enter and try again.

Back: "First Name" is required. Enter and try again.
Takaisin: "First Name" is required. Enter and try again.

Back: "Last Name" is required. Enter and try again.
Takaisin: "Last Name" is required. Enter and try again.

Back: Your password must be at least %1 characters.
Your password must include both numeric and alphabetic characters.
Takaisin: Salasanan tulee sisältää sekä numeroja, että kirjaimia.

Back: Your password confirmation must match your password.
Takaisin: Salasanan vahvistuksen on oltava sama kuin salasana.

Back: It's time to change your password.
It's time to change your password.
Your password has expired; please contact your administrator.
Takaisin: Salasanasi on vanhentunut; ole hyvä ja ota yhteyttä ylläpitäjään.

Back: Enter your email address.  You will receive an email with a link to reset your password.
Takaisin: Syötä sähköpostiosoitteesi.  Saat sähköpostiviestin, jossa olevalla linkillä voit vaihtaa salasanasi.

Back:
Warning!
This action will remove this user from already assigned role.
Are you sure?
Takaisin:
Warning!
This action will remove this user from already assigned role.
Are you sure?

Back:
Warning!
This action will remove those users from already assigned roles.
Are you sure?
Takaisin:
Warning!
This action will remove those users from already assigned roles.
Are you sure?

Back: A new admin account was created for %first_name, %last_name using %email.
Takaisin: A new admin account was created for %first_name, %last_name using %email.

Back: If you have not authorized this action, please contact us immediately at %store_email
Takaisin: Jos et ole pyytänyt tätä toimintoa, ota välittömästi yhteyttä osoitteeseen %store_email

Back: There was recently a request to change the password for your account.
If you requested this change, reset your password here:
Takaisin: Jos olet pyytänyt tämän muutoksen, palauta salasanasi tästä:

Back: If you did not make this request, you can ignore this email and your password will remain the same.
Takaisin: Jos et jättänyt tätä pyyntöä, voit ohittaa tämän sähköpostin ja salasana pysyy samana.

Back: We have received a request to change the following information associated with your account at %store_name: %changes.
Takaisin: Olemme saaneet pyynnön muuttaa seuraavia tietoja %store_name -tilissäsi: %changes.

Back: Email template chosen based on theme fallback when "Default" option is selected.
Takaisin: Valittu sähköpostimalli perustuu teeman fallbackiin kun "Default" -vaihtoehto on valittuna.

Back: Maximum Login Failures to Lockout Account
Takaisin: Epäonnistuneiden kirjautumisten maksimimäärä ennen tilin lukkiutumista

Back: We will disable this feature if the value is empty.
Takaisin: Poistamme tämän ominaisuuden käytöstä, jos arvo on tyhjä.
